title: Vengeance
description: Strictly over 18+This ebook contains scenes of a violent sexual nature which some readers may find offensiveJesse likes women they just don't seem to like him. After a horrific accident caused by his violent father leaves him heavily scarred Jesse becomes accustomed to the local women, particularly Melissa shunning him. One evening working girl Melissa offers to pick Jesse up some smokes but when she returns to his filthy shabby trailer Melissa gets more than she bargained for. Jesse's full anger is released and worse still Jesse enjoys it, believes it's his calling to rid the world of filthy women like Melissa. He starts a terrible rampage killing girl after girl but when things in his trailer start to move of their own accord Jesse brushes it aside,after all a higher power is willing him to do these things, but one should never ignore things that go bump in the night!
author: C.J. Steel
